etl.query:
SELECT uuid AS uuid_key, name AS title, description, CASE WHEN language IS NULL THEN 'en' ELSE language END AS language, CASE WHEN char_length(trim(iso_country_code))<2 THEN null ELSE iso_country_code END AS country, homepage, logoURL AS logo_url, CASE WHEN char_length(trim(address))<1 THEN null ELSE address END AS address, CASE WHEN char_length(trim(city))<1 THEN null ELSE city END AS city, CASE WHEN char_length(trim(email))<5 THEN null ELSE email END AS email, CASE WHEN char_length(trim(phone))<5 THEN null ELSE phone END AS phone, CASE WHEN char_length(trim(zip))<1 THEN null ELSE zip END AS postal_code, created, modified, deleted FROM agent WHERE type=14000
INSERT INTO node(key,title,description,language,email,phone,homepage,logo_url,address,city,country,postal_code, created,modified,deleted,type,participation_status,continent, created_by, modified_by ) VALUES(?uuid_key::uuid,?title,?description,?language,?email,?phone,?homepage,?logo_url,?address,?city,?country,?postal_code, ?created,?modified,?deleted,?{"COUNTRY"}::enum_node_type,?{"VOTING"}::enum_node_participation_status, ?{"AFRICA"}::enum_node_continent, ?{"ADMIN"}, ?{"ADMIN"});
